official_title: A bill to establish the Information Center on Economic Competitiveness.
short_title: Information Center on Economic Competitiveness Act of 1985

summary.text: Information Center on Economic Competitiveness Act of 1985 - Establishes in the Department of Commerce an Information Center on Economic Competitiveness to collect and analyze information on the competitiveness of U.S. industries. Sets forth the duties and powers of the Center. Requires the Center to report annually to the President and the Congress on the Federal Government's information gathering capacity on economic competitiveness and the functioning of the Center's operations. Authorizes appropriations.

titles.title: Information Center on Economic Competitiveness Act of 1985
A bill to establish the Information Center on Economic Competitiveness.
